title: 'I really love him a lot': Camila Cabello confesses she's 'pretty happy' with Shawn Mendes
text:
Since going public, they have made no secret of their steamy romance.

So naturally, Camila Cabelo was keen to chat about her romance with Shawn Mendes as she appeared on Capital Breakfast with Roman Kemp on Thursday.

The Havana songstress, 22, gushed over the romance with the crooner, 21, saying: 'Yeah. Yeah, we’re pretty happy, I really, really love him a lot.'

Chatting away: Camila Cabelo was keen to chat about her romance with Shawn Mendes as she appeared on Capital Breakfast with Roman Kemp on Thursday

Camila chatted freely on the radio about her romance which was born of much speculation before they finally confirmed their love.

When asked how it was working with Shawn, she said: 'Well it was so fun! You know, we’ve been friends for a really long time and we were kinda like we just didn’t…

'There was a period where we didn’t hang out as much just because we were both busy and this song was really fun because we got to just hang out again like we did on the song we did before - I Know What You Did Last Summer...

Here they are! The Havana songstress, 22, gushed over the romance with the crooner, 21, saying: 'Yeah. Yeah, we’re pretty happy, I really, really love him a lot'

'Which was when we got really close. This was just like we were like ‘oh yay, we get to be pals and just hang out!’

As well as chatting about her romance, she was also discussing her ambitions to gain a Nando's Black Card - a card which permits the user to get free chicken for life.

Roman said: 'You are tweeting a lot about the Nando’s Black Card', to which she said: 'I know! When will they give it to me?!'

'They definitely tweeted me back before but I think they’re just kinda, like, ghosting me on this Black Card thing a bit.
